text: Jab yeh iss say mayus hogaye to tanahee mein beth ker mashwara kerney lagay. Inn mein jo sab say bara tha uss ney kaha tumhen maloom nahi kay tumharay walid ney tum say Allah ki qasam ley ker pukhta qol-o-qarar liya hai aur iss say pehlay yousuf kay baray mein tum kotahi ker chukay ho. Pus mein to iss sir zamin say na taloo ga jabtak walid shab khud mujhay ijazat na den ya Allah Taalaa meray iss moamlay ka faisla ker den wohi behtareen faisla kerney wala hai
